content:
@here -- Hey all! We are having our monthly Shorthand call on Thursday June 11 at 9 am Eastern. Please note that the meeting has been moved from Skype to Microsoft Teams. We will be going over a few interesting ballot issues, so please join and make your opinions known:

  • FHIR-27265 - "Or" versus "|"? (And comma versus "and")
  • FHIR-27175 - Sushi and Shorthand - separate or part of the same IG?
  • FHIR-27226 - Quantities -- values and units
  • FHIR-27200 - Should value set rules use "include"?
  • FHIR-27287 - Eliminate Mixin keyword, replace with inserting rule sets
  • FHIR-27294 - Dropping of "Reference"
  • FHIR-27288 - Extend rule sets to value sets and code systems
Just want to make sure everyone was aware we have switched from Skype to Microsoft Teams. Here's the link for today's meeting
